entry.summary: ...SNOW AND BLOWING SNOW TOMORROW... Another weather system is expected to move over the west coast of Alaska tomorrow. This will bring another round of snow and blowing snow to the region. Stay tuned to weather.gov/fairbanks for the latest updates.

entry.title: Red Flag Warning issued March 31 at 9:05AM MDT until March 31 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...ANOTHER DAY OF CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS... Another round of strong and gusty winds will occur today, this time from the northwest.
